page.title: 07The Walsingham Estate Co.
page.content: 1The Company was formed in{1926}when the{Gurney}family acquired the Walsingham Estate which was previously owned by the{Lee Warner}family.Sir Eustace and Lady Gurney and John Gurney,now Managing Director,original Directors.The estate covers{5,000 {acres}in the villages of Lt. Walsingham,Gt.Walsingham,Houghton St.Giles and Gt.Snoring.The land is generally productive for arable farming and comprises 11 tenanted farms,smallholdings,allotments and{200 acres of mixed broadleaf and coniferous woodlands.There are over{ {100}houses and various shops.The site of Walsingham Priory,now known as the Abbey,is open to the public during the summer months.The{estate staff} consists of an Agent,a Book_keeper,10 Builders,2 Foresters,2 Gate_keepers,2 Gardeners and 2 Gamekeepers.
